Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 8.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init?(_ range: NSRange)
```

Available when `Bound` conforms to `BinaryInteger`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Range/init(_:)-1q7lu#see-also)
